text: The Barrier is a lostThe Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: The Barrier 1917 American silent northwoods drama film directed by Edgar Lewis and starring Mabel Julienne Scott. It is based on the Rex Beach novel The Barrier.Progressive Silent Film List: The Barrier at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films: The Barrier(Wayback) The Beach novel was filmed again by MGM in 1926 as The Barrier starring Lionel Barrymore. ==Cast== *Mabel Julienne Scott as Necia / Merridy *Russell Simpson as John Gaylord / John Gale *Howard Hall as Dan Bennett / Ben Stark *Victor Sutherland as Lt.
